summary: This document is an email chain from July 2019 between FBI personnel and a CNN reporter, Mirna Alsharif. The reporter is inquiring about the verification of a report made by a victim, referred to as 'Maria Farmer', who alleged she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in 1996 and reported it to the FBI. The internal FBI discussion references prior interviews and investigations.

persons.name: Mirna Alsharif
persons.context: A reporter from CNN's New York Bureau who emails the FBI to verify the existence of a report made by a victim alleging sexual assault by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in 1996.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The multimillionaire financier accused of sexually assaulting the victim, Maria Farmer, in 1996.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Epstein's companion, also accused of molesting the victim's younger sister in 1996 according to the victim's affidavit.

persons.name: Maria Farmer
persons.context: The victim who filed a sworn affidavit alleging she was sexually assaulted by Epstein and Maxwell in 1996 when she was 26 and employed by Epstein. She reported the assault to NY police and the FBI.

connections.description: Described as companions; both are accused of sexual assault against Maria Farmer and her younger sister in 1996.
Epstein is accused of sexually assaulting Maria Farmer, who was his employee, in 1996.
Maxwell is accused of molesting Maria Farmer's younger sister in 1996 according to the victim's affidavit.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Assault by Epstein and Maxwell
events.description: Maria Farmer alleges she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein and her younger sister was molested by Ghislaine Maxwell. She was employed by Epstein at the time.

events.title: Report to NY Police and FBI
events.description: Maria Farmer reported the alleged 1996 assault to New York police and the FBI.

events.title: FBI Interview of Maria Farmer
events.description: FBI documents reference Maria Farmer being interviewed by the FBI in 2006 or 2007 as part of an investigation.

events.title: CNN Inquiry to FBI
events.description: CNN reporter Mirna Alsharif emails the FBI to verify the existence of Maria Farmer's 1996 report.

locations: 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278 (FBI New York Division)
Upper East Side, New York (Epstein's mansion)
keyFacts: A victim, Maria Farmer, filed a sworn affidavit alleging she was sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein and her younger sister was molested by Ghislaine Maxwell in 1996.
Maria Farmer reported the assault to both New York police and the FBI in 1996.
FBI documents released on April 1, 2019, reference Maria Farmer being interviewed by the FBI in 2006 or 2007.
In July 2019, CNN contacted the FBI to verify the existence of Maria Farmer's 1996 report, indicating ongoing media and public interest in the case.
